To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RateOfChange _roc;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_roc = ROC(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_roc.IsReady)
{
    var period = _roc.Period.Value;
    var current = _roc.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.roc = self.ROC(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.roc.IsReady:
    period = self.roc.Period.Value
    current = self.roc.Current.Value
